roleset.name: to function as an officer of a duty, such as a priest or referee

roles.note: The predication argument is specified by the VerbNet class, but I am not certain that this argument will arise in actual usage.

role.descr: role, secondary predication of arg0, officiated as what?

example.name: Transitive
example.text: Outgoing Taipei mayor Ma Ying-jeou officiated on the 11th evening the opening of this year's Christmas celebration...
example.arg: the opening of this year's Christmas Celebration

predicate.note: Frames file for 'officiate' based on survey of sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. VerbNet entry 29.6.
